required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Real-world Evaluation of Brolucizumab for the Treatment of Neovascular (Wet) Age-related Macular Degeneration (AMD) (Komodo Health)
clinical_study.official_title: Real-world Evaluation of Brolucizumab for the Treatment of Neovascular (Wet) Age-related Macular Degeneration (AMD) (Komodo Health)

brief_summary.textblock: This study was a retrospective cohort study of patients to assess the early insights into real-world safety among wet AMD patients initiating brolucizumab. Evidence was generated to describe their patient characteristics and clinical outcomes. The study was conducted using the Komodo Healthcare Map.

detailed_description.textblock:
Komodo Healthcare Map claims data from 08-Oct-2016 to the date of most recent data from patients with wet AMD who initiated brolucizumab were analyzed in this study.
- Identification period of the index date (index period): The patients fulfilling the selection criteria were identified during the period from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020.
- Index date: Defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period.
- Study Period: The period from 08-Oct-2016 to the most recent data extraction date (05-Jun-2020).
o Note since 05-Jun-2020 was the date data was pulled, claims data from recent months (e.g. May) may be incomplete (relative to the final DB state) as well.
- Pre-index period: The period 36 months prior to the index date
o Note: Data within 36 months prior to the index date will be used to assess baseline characteristics.
- Post-index period: The period of 180 days after the index date

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with an Intraocular Inflammation (IOI) event during the first 6 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 6 months post brolucizumab injection
primary_outcome.description: To assess IOI events observed after starting treatment with brolucizumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Index date defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period (from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020)
secondary_outcome.description: Age information was reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Gender information
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Index date defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period (from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020)
secondary_outcome.description: Gender information was reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients at various Patient Region
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Index date defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period (from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020)
secondary_outcome.description: Patient regions: Northeast, Midwest, South, West, Unknown

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with Insurance type
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Index date defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period (from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020)
secondary_outcome.description: Insurance type: Private, Medicare, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid, Other

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with Laterality of wet Age-related macular degeneration (AMD)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Index date defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period (from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020)
secondary_outcome.description: Laterality of wet AMD: Unilateral, Bilateral

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with Laterality of any Age-related macular degeneration (AMD)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Index date defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period (from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020)
secondary_outcome.description: Laterality of wet AMD: Unilateral, Bilateral

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of eyes with the concurrent eye disease
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 180 days prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Types of concurrent eye diseases: Cataracts Posterior vitreous detachment Puckering of macula Macular hole Vitreomacular traction Glaucoma Amblyopia Papillitis Ischemic optic atrophy Diabetic retinopathy Diabetic macular edema Hypertensive retinopathy Pathologic myopia RAO RO RV Vitritis Endophthalmitis Uveitis Choroidal neovascularization (due to causes other than AMD, if possible, to determine) IOI

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with previous ocular surgeries or procedures
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 180 days prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Types: Laser photocoagulation (or laser therapy) Photodynamic therapy (PDT) Glaucoma surgery (trabeculectomy, MIGS) Cataract surgery Iridotomy Ocular radiation Panretinal photocoagulation Submacular surgery, other surgical intervention or laser treatment for AMD Vitrectomy Scleral buckle Pneumatic retinopexy Cryopexy

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with systemic comorbidities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Types: Obesity Cerebrovascular disease Peripheral vascular disease Diabetes Renal disease Chronic pulmonary disease Congestive heart failure Any malignancy, including lymphoma and leukemia Myocardial infarction Dementia Arteriothrombotic event Thromboembolytic event Atherosclerosis Arterial hypertension Ischemic heart disease Atrial fibrillation Lipid disorders Cardiac septal defect Valvular cardiac defect Hyperlipidemia Hypercholesterolemia Atherosclerotic disease Thrombosis Carotid artery disease

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Concomitant systemic medications (chronic use)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Types: Corticosteroids Systemic anti-VEGFs Lipid lowering agents Antihypertensives Biologics Antimetabolites/cancer therapy Anticoagulants

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with the Cataract status
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Types: phakic, pseudophakic, aphakic

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with Intraocular inflammation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 and 6 months prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were reported: No history of IOI and endophthalmitis related to safety evaluation and panuveitis History of IOI and endophthalmitis related to safety evaluation and panuveitis History of IOI including panuveitis (excluding endophthalmitis related to safety evaluation) History of endophthalmitis related to safety evaluation History of panuveitis

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with the history of ocular inflammation (includes IOIs or panuveitis or endophthalmitis relevant to safety evaluation)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were reported: History of anterior inflammation History of posterior inflammation No history of IOI or endophthalmitis related to safety evaluation or panuveitis History of IOI and/or endophthalmitis related to safety evaluation and/or panuveitis History of IOI including panuveitis (excluding endophthalmitis related to safety evaluation) History of endophthalmitis related to safety evaluation History of Panuveitis

secondary_outcome.measure: History of other IOI and endophthalmitis due to infections or other underlying disease
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36, 12 and 6 months prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were reported: No history of inflammation History of any ocular inflammation History of severe ocular inflammation History of anterior inflammation History of posterior inflammation History of IOI or endophthalmitis due to infections and other underlying disease (separate category)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with prior Intraocular Inflammation (IOI) and/or prior Retinal vascular occlusion (RO)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 months prior to the index date ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Included history of ocular inflammation or occlusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with Systemic inflammation / auto-immune history (in total and at the event level)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were reported: Systemic vasculitis Rheumatoid arthritis SLE Multiple sclerosis Sarcoidosis Giant cell arteritis / Temporal arteritis HLA-B27 diseases Behcet/Behcet's disease Ankylosing Spondylitis Crohn Disease Drug Hypersensitivity Vogt-Koyanagi-Harada (VKH)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with the Provider specialty
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Index date defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period (from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020)
secondary_outcome.description: The following types were included: Retina specialist, General ophthalmologist, Non-retina specialist, unknown

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with Concomitant ocular medications
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following types were included: any corticosteroids [prednisone, prednisolone acetate, difluprednate, Kenalog, ozurdex, yutiq], biologics [adalimumab], cyclosporine, azathioprine, methotrexate, ganciclovir, acyclovir, valacyclovir, foscavir, trifluridine, mycophenolate, rituxan, vancomycin, prostaglandins

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of exam performed
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30 days before or on first brolucizumab injection (index date)
secondary_outcome.description: OCT, FA, CP - color photo or color fundus photo

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of eyes treated with brolucizumab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Index date defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection during the index period (from 08-Oct-2019 to 30-Apr-2020)
secondary_outcome.description: The following types were included: OD [eye, right], OS [eye, left], Unspecified, Unilateral, Bilateral)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with Anti-VEGF treatment-naive vs prior-treated
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 60 months prior to index ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Anti-VEGF treatment-naive vs prior-treated were measured at the eye-level

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with prior treatment status
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 60 months prior to index ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following types were included: off-label bevacizumab, ranibizumab, aflibercept, unknown, treatment-naive

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with different prior anti-VEGF agents
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 60 months prior to index ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Following categories will be included : 0, 1, 2, ≥3

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with prior anti-VEGF agents (total, per anti-VEGF agent)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 60 months prior to index ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Following categories will be included : Continuous Categorical: <6, 6 to <12, 12 to <24, ≥24

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient eyes with the Last injection inetrval
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 60 months prior to index ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Following categories will be included : Continuous (weeks) Categorical: <4, 4 to <6, 6 to <8, ≥8, <12, ≥12 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of last anti-VEGF treatment (total, per anti-VEGF agent)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 60 months prior to index ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Following categories will be included : All anti-VEGFs i. Continuous ii. Categorical: <6, 6 to <12, 12 to <24, ≥24 months Specific anti-VEGF iii. Continuous (days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time since wet Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) diagnosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Patients were measured at the eye level

secondary_outcome.measure: Time since any Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) diagnosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 36-month period prior to the index date (inclusive of the index date) ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: Patients were measured at the eye level

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from last anti-VEGF injection to index date
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 60 months prior to index ( index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection)
secondary_outcome.description: The following categories were measured: Continuous (days) Categorical (0-30, 31-60, 61-90, 91+ days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of ocular adverse events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Post-index period defined as the 180 days following therapy initiation, excluding index date
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the incidence of ocular AEs among patients treated with brolucizumab

arm_group.description: Participants received brolucizumab injection during the index period

intervention.description: Participants received brolucizumab injection during the index period

study_pop.textblock: Patients with wet AMD who initiated brolucizumab were analyzed in this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
1. ≥1 Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) code (J code) or National Drug Code (NDC) for treatment with brolucizumab during the index period (date of earliest code = index date)
2. ≥18 years old on the index date
3. ≥1 International Classification of Diseases, Clinical Modification-9/10 (ICD-9/10) code for wet AMD in the 36 months prior to or on the index date
- Note: Off-label use of brolucizumab is not expected given payer access restrictions in the US
4. ≥24 months of continuous enrollment prior to the index date
5. ≥1 follow-up visit related to their wet AMD after the index date
Exclusion criteria:
1. Use of brolucizumab prior to 08-Oct-2019 (e.g. clinical trials)
2. Unknown laterality of the index eye on the index date
3. Patients with no data throughout the 12 months immediately prior to the index date
